attributes.action: BAN THE POWER FROM WASTE INCINERATOR AT MERTHYR TYDFIL
attributes.additional_details: The government should ban incinerators that use household waste to produce electrical energy.        The one planned at Merthyr Tydfil, has applied to Emmit 7.5 tonnes of MERCURY, 18.9 tonnes of LEAD and 150 grams of DIOXIN, + 22 other toxins, Why cant the European clean air act  stop this pollution? why are American companies  being allowed to use a process here, that is no longer allowed in the USA
